mapper.select: SELECT m.name , m.id , m.parent_id parentId , m.path FROM role_menu rm LEFT JOIN menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT m.name , m.id , m.parent_id parentId , m.path, tmp.authorized FROM role_menu rm LEFT JOIN menu m on m.id = rm.menu_id left join (select menu_id, 'true' as authorized from role_menu rm where rm.role_id = #{roleId}) tmp on tmp.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{parentRoleId}
SELECT m.name , m.id , m.parent_id parentId , m.path FROM menu m
select i.* , tmp.checked from interface i left join (select mi.interface_id, 'true' as checked from menu_interface mi where mi.menu_id= #{menuId}) tmp on tmp.interface_id = i.id
mapper.delete: delete from menu where id = #{menu.id} and NOT EXISTS (select id from (SELECT id FROM menu WHERE parent_id = #{menu.id}) tmp);
mapper.insert: insert into menu(name, path, parent_id) SELECT #{menu.name}, #{menu.path}, #{menu.parentId} FROM DUAL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT id FROM menu WHERE id = #{menu.parentId})
